price: 64. Kino tokomekisaka bato ya bozwi etumbu 0 kati na bango. Mpe okomona bango bakomi koganga тропа kosenga lisalisi.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذۡنَا مُتۡرَفِيهِم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمۡ يَجۡـَٔرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā akhadhnā mut'rafīhim bil-ʿadhābi idhā hum yajarūna
